scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=test concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.migrate:prod: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env production
scripts.migrate:undo:prod: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --env production
scripts.migrate:undo:all:prod: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --env production
scripts.seed:prod: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env production
scripts.seed:undo:prod: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --env production
scripts.seed:undo:all:prod: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --env production
scripts.seed:dev: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env development
scripts.seed:undo:dev: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --env development
scripts.seed:undo:all:dev: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --env development
scripts.seed:test: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env test
scripts.seed:undo:test: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --env test
scripts.seed:undo:all:test: cd backend && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --env test
scripts.prod: concurrently "cd backend && npm run prod" "cd frontend && npm run prod"
